scripts.ngrok: npm run ngrok:http && npm run telegram:webhook:set
scripts.ngrok:http: { ngrok http 5000 > /dev/null & } && echo 'Waiting for running ngrok server' && sleep 3
scripts.ngrok:kill: ps aux | grep ngrok | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.telegram:webhook:set:w: bottender telegram webhook set -w $(curl --silent --show-error ngrok:4040/api/tunnels | sed -nE 's/.*public_url":"(https:..[^"]*).*/\1/p')
